item.title: Congress Has A Chance To Defund Planned Parenthood. Here’s Why The GOP Should Take It
item.description: There are plenty of good reasons why Planned Parenthood and its abortionist allies are undeserving of subsidization by the U.S. government.

item.title: SCOTUS To Consider Whether Government Can Strangle Therapists’ Speech
item.description: Chiles v. Salazar could prove a landmark Supreme Court ruling that prevents the government from forcing counselors to endorse gender ideology.

item.title: Your Guide To The Lawsuits Challenging A President’s Power To Fire Executive Officials
item.description: Since President Donald Trump reclaimed the executive branch in January, more than 50 lawsuits have been filed to halt his America-first efforts.
